Review.Titre: Did not keep shipping promise.
Review.Contenu: I placed my order on November 24th around 12:30pm EST and paid for 2-day shipping. It says in the email that all orders placed before 2pm EST will ship same day. My order did not ship until November 27th and arrived November 29th. I emailed and asked if I could receive a refund on the shipping cost since I paid for 2-day shipping and ordered early enough for it to be shipped same day, but it was not, and I have not received any communication back.

Review.Titre: Totally crummy experience!
Review.Contenu: It was impossible to contact anyone by phone... none of the options either picked up or returned my messages. Therefore my husband was unable to determine if the fan we ordered would fit the way he thought it would. We purchased it based on the limited information on the website. AFTER we returned it, I received an email letting me know that that fan would not work in an Enviro stove.  Iwas told I could return it, but I would be out the cost of shipping. I was given no return instructions or return label, so I simply sent it to the return address on the box.  As of yet I  have not heard that you've received it.  That was a crummy experience costing me time, frustration, and forty dollars!

Review.Titre: Payed for 2 day shipping and no product
Review.Contenu: Payed for 2 day shipping for furnace parts that I desperately need and I still have not received it. Probably won't order anything from you again and will avoid fedex at all cost. They have been here several times in the past so I'm not sure if it's your business or fedex but someone royally screwed me over!

Review.Titre: Item purchased was faulty and wired…
Review.Contenu: Item purchased was faulty and wired backwards.  When installed is ruined my appliance and they are not doing anything about it.  BEWARE BEWARE DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Installed by plumber and water heater was damaged beyond repair. Plumber did the electrical check after damage was done to determine that the smart valve was no longer functional. SO who is going to pay for the damages because of the faulty wiring on the part?!

Review.Titre: I paid extra for my package to get here…
Review.Contenu: I paid extra for my package to get here fed air  I gave  instructions for the package to be placed in the black box on the front porch. proof of delivery picture showed the package on the ground with a dog by the package.  This was unacceptable

Review.Titre: You guys sent me the wrong motor
Review.Contenu: You guys sent me the wrong motor 1.the mounting bolts are not the same . 2 the motor spins the wrong direction when correctly wired.  3 even the label on the motor does not say 32330 like your website advertised it does

Review.Titre: The product we purchased is not what…
Review.Contenu: The product we purchased is not what they claim it to be. It doesn’t match the discrimination as to what it will fit. Also we can not get an authorization to return it nor can we get anyone to respond to our phone calls and emails.

Review.Titre: Charg for a next day delivery and…
Review.Contenu: Charg for a next day delivery and arrive  seven days after. Request for refund no answer.

Review.Contenu: Junk....both of the purchased igniters failed after the first light.  Would not purchased these again.  As per the sellers description, these igniters were installed in a Napolean NPS45 pullet stove.

They sent me the wrong part and will…
Review.Contenu: They sent me the wrong part and will not let me return it. So I just lost $62.00.

Review.Titre: This wasn’t a direct replacement
Review.Contenu: This wasn’t a direct replacement. I had to purchase new piping from the valve to the burner assembly because the outlet was threaded for fit pipe instead of the pilot tube fitting. There were no options for mounting the valve. That being said. It does work after a few hours of installation.

Review.Titre: After purchasing a part for my elderly…
Review.Contenu: After purchasing a part for my elderly father's home heating unit, we were shocked to see that a part that is a bit fragile was put into a soft baggie to be shipped.  It was not in a well protected box.  We had a terrible snow storm and this part was shoved in my mailbox along with the other mail.  Had it been sealed in a box and properly insulated/packaged it wouldn't have been showed around.  Very disappointed in the packaging.  I guess we will see if it works once installed.

Review.Titre: In stock but not really
Review.Contenu: You accepted  my purchase  only to refund me two days later due to no stock. This is terrible due to the fact I must spend time to search again, delay a part that my customers rely on, and also keep an eye on my credit bill to be sure  the refund was made.

Review.Titre: They leave it totally up to you to…
Review.Contenu: They leave it totally up to you to order the right part so if you happen to not get the right part it's your fault

Review.Titre: Shipping is terrible you send me a…
Review.Contenu: Shipping is terrible you send me a questionnaire and I did not receive the product yet.

Review.Titre: Item shipped to wrong address
Review.Contenu: Item was shipped to wrong address and it was not an OEM(Samsung Brand) item as listed.

Review.Titre: Good price but the fan won't get out of…
Review.Contenu: Good price but the fan won't get out of low speed.  If we weren't getting a blizzard this week I would send it back

Review.Titre: It's all bent up
Review.Contenu: It's all bent up. Hopefully when I go to install it,it works

Review.Titre: Correct part number, but wrong mounting flange.
Review.Contenu: I ordered the exact part number that is listed in the Lopi Deerfield manual which apparently is the same as the Lopi AGP; however, the mounting brackets are apparently different and so I had to use an angle grinder to cut it to fit.   Since I wasn’t home I couldn’t verify that the part looked different when I ordered.   Besides that, part works as it should and my pellet stove is back up and running.  Easy fix if you have the correct tools, but I shouldn’t have had to do that.

Review.Titre: Customer service lacking.
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to reach direct brand for weeks. Every time I try to send an email, it comes back as undeliverable. The customer service is lacking hugely.Update. I did receive a return label, returned the item. And received a refund. BUT, the email address they give you is still not valid. Thankfully I DID receive my refund. But I was never able to actually speak to someone in customer service.

Review.Titre: I guess it is more my fault for not…
Review.Contenu: I guess it is more my fault for not looking closer before ordering. Doesnt work for my grill at all. Not for pit boss memphis ultimate.

Review.Titre: Item came when expected unfortunately…
Review.Contenu: Item came when expected unfortunately the items that go with it have not arrived yet so I cannot rate how well the item functions.

Review.Titre: Order was processed and shipped in a…
Review.Contenu: Order was processed and shipped in a timely manner from Grafton, MA. My disappointment comes from being charged foreign transaction fees on my credit card as the charge was "processed" in the UK. I could not find any warning of this on the website. Not a good business practice.

Review.Titre: No complaints on the website or the…
Review.Contenu: No complaints on the website or the ordering process.  The stove knobs on the other hand aren’t worth the word “junk”.  I would rather spend twice as much and get a quality product.  These are going right into the garbage!Thanks

Review.Titre: Fan runs good but has vibration and…
Review.Contenu: Fan runs good but has vibration and loud on speeds 3,4,5

Review.Titre: the part fit ok would of liked a email…
Review.Contenu: the part fit ok would of liked a email when it would be delivered not knowing seems like it took alittle bit to come but over all happy with the part

Review.Titre: Absolutely love the tall baseboard heat…
Review.Contenu: Absolutely love the tall baseboard heat covers, just wish they had the cover for the connecting boards and the corner cover.  Went back to order more and they have the corner cover but it says it’s a left end cover, called and left msg regarding that as I need two corner covers for now but so far no one has called me back.

Review.Titre: Igniter
Review.Contenu: The igniter was received in excellent condition at a good price. The new part corrected the problem. I was a little disappointed in the delivery time it took a week but with the pandemic I guess that can be expected.

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: Extremely poor customer service. No response from email, no response from calls. I emailed twice with no response.Edit: i was reached out after this review. I appreciate the response to my concern.

Review.Titre: Great prices, customer service OK.
Review.Contenu: i like the price, i like the customer service.What I didn't like is that I didn't get confirmation email for about two-three days as the part I ordered was backordered. However, a quick phone call and everything is OK

Review.Titre: Decent service
Review.Contenu: Decent service. Only had one of the item I ordered. Called and refunded  Quickly for unfulfilled part of order. Basically what you want in service. No surprises

Review.Contenu: Oven rack came as described, reasonably quickly.  Feels a tiny bit flimsy, but I am happy with the item considering the price paid.

Review.Titre: Good product and quick service
Review.Contenu: Quick service

Review.Titre: Received part on time
Review.Contenu: Received part on time, part was much less than competitors. FED EX delivered next door though.

Review.Titre: Great parts better customer service
Review.Contenu: I needed the part overnight, but FedEx failed to accomplish this goal. I called direct brand and they were quick to resolve my problems by refunding my shipping costs. When the part arrived it was much more robust than the original part I pulled out and my water heater fired right up. Shop with these guys with confidence.

Review.Titre: I had a technical issue and the owner…
Review.Contenu: I had a technical issue and the owner Matthew returned my call and found an immediate solution!  Amazing old fashioned and honest service without any headache. Matthew and his team shipped my order immediately and I am very pleased to use this business and recommend to others. Joseph Outer Cape Home WatchProvincetown MA

Review.Titre: I want to thank you for your quick…
Review.Contenu: I want to thank you for your quick response and shipping. Received my Booster pressure pump in 2days. Awesome service. Other suppliers required several weeks delivery even if it was in stock.I highly recommend your company, product and service.Thanks again so much for your quick response.Larry

Review.Titre: Best price on a replacement igniter …
Review.Contenu: Best price on a replacement water heater flame sensor/igniter combo. Shipping was a little high and slow through USPS but it arrived in excellent condition and was still less expensive than the previous one I purchased from Home Depot. Lasted about 1-1/2 years before I needed to clean off the oxidation. Hoping it lasts a while longer before using this replacement.

Review.Titre: After looking back through my Emails
Review.Contenu: After looking back through my Emails, I did see the you sent me a tracking number.  Even though the part is not at the front door as where it says it was delivered, that is not your company’s fault. I will file a claim with UPS.

Review.Titre: Affordable quality parts;friendly and helpful staff
Review.Contenu: We've owned the same pellet stove since 2007,so when parts started wearing out,I was surprised at the price of replacements locally and online.When the distribution motor went,I was lucky to find Direct Brand had what I needed at a price much lower than other places.I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of said unit.Very pleasant folks to work with to boot.Now I can keep the house warm without breaking the bank or settling for lower quality parts as I have done in the past...'shopping here for all my pellet stove parts from now on.

Review.Titre: The ignited/flame sensor was exactly as…
Review.Contenu: The ignited/flame sensor was exactly as promised.  It fit perfect installed easily.  The price was about 60 percent of what other companies were asking.  Shipping was reasonable and it arrived very quickly. I will purchase from DB again.

Review.Titre: I fixed my pressure smoker with the 250 watt igniter.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a 250 watt igniter to fix my Gourmia electric pressure smoker. I received it in a timely manner. 📦 I popped it into the smoker and put it back together and smoked a rack of ribs and two pork tenderloins. 🥩🍖I took one bite and my mouth was filled with that instant smoky flavor that everyone craves. 😆🤪 It works as advertised. I should order another one and keep it as a backup.

Review.Titre: Right on service
Review.Contenu: Service was fast and easy. The part was slightly ill fitting though it was an exact model match number match.  Did some minor widening mod of the opening for part to fit through…easy for me but not so for folks without proper tools This is the manufacturer fault though.

Review.Titre: Shipping Problems
Review.Contenu: The form to order was made easy and fast.  unfortunately I paid an extra $ 14.88 for my order to arrive in 2 days.  this did not happen.  My order was from August 4 and I received my order until August 11.  I understand that these are difficult times due to the pandemic.  But they should not offer the 2-day express service if you are having shipping problems.Thanks to customer service for sending a refund for the extra shipping charge.

Review.Titre: Direct brand had the part I needed at a…
Review.Contenu: Direct brand had the part I needed at a great price. I did have to purchase the part locally because I needed it right away and shipping took a longer than anticipated, so I will keep this for a spare.

Review.Titre: Satisfied
Review.Contenu: I received the part in a timely manner, unfortunately it was not the part we needed and the one I do was out of stock. Just hoping to get one before winter. A year without hot water is disheartening but I'm keeping the faith with direct brand.

Review.Titre: Highly recommend
Review.Contenu: Got the oem number off my failed blower and they had the exact replacement at about half the price of some other places.  Needed it asap so went with the next day option and it arrived just as planned.  Installed and running again made easy with the right part

Review.Titre: I was expecting to pay an arm and leg…
Review.Contenu: I was expecting to pay an arm and leg for OEM parts but was pleasantly surprised to find them here for less and delivered fast. I was able to get my customers stove up and running for far less than replacing the stove.

Review.Titre: Direct Brand takes care of any problems
Review.Contenu: I like most folks are on a very tight budget. Direct Brand's products and prices grabbed my attention. I ordered 2 room blowers and an exhaust blower that matched up perfectly to my 3 King pellet stoves. They sent to me an incorrect room blower from what I ordered. I called the phone number given and left many messages but nobody ever called me back. I got through to them by the e-mail I found on the BBB website, they then promptly e-mailed me back. They then sent me the correct part and covered all charges for sending back the incorrect part. Some may say not to give 5 stars due to this however working in retail most my life I know accidents do happen and they fixed the problem and even refunded the UPS charges back to me of which I paid for the initial order. So folks please lighten up, I know I will be ordering from them again and know that if a situation arises they will take care of the problem.

Review.Titre: My experience was great because the…
Review.Contenu: My experience was great because the prices are good

Review.Titre: Very pleased w/ Direct Brand
Review.Contenu: Very pleased w/ Direct Brand.  Pricing was much cheaper than other suppliers. Shipping was very quick.I plan on placing another order this weekend.Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Great follow-up customer service
Review.Contenu: Great follow-up customer service! Unfortunately the unit we purchased didn't work with our electronics, and the rep was very quick in replying to our concerns, trying to help, and ultimately taking care of the return in a courteous and prompt way. Our electronic device was old so maybe that was the problem, and I appreciate her taking care of us.

Review.Titre: The product was delivered on time as…
Review.Contenu: The product was delivered on time as estimated and it was a direct fit to the water heater.

Review.Titre: I bought a Sylvania tv remote and it…
Review.Contenu: I bought a Sylvania tv remote and it would not program. Name Brand Direct was  1) very responsive and got back with me quickly  2)  refunded my money  3)  made it easy. VERY  IMPRESSED  AND  HAPPY!  Thank you namebranddirect.  Pat Davis, Seattle WA

Review.Titre: Searched for obsolete ignitor part#...
Review.Contenu: Searched for obsolete ignitor part# and replacement part came up in search. Cheapest price and fast shipping. Good communication too! Works like a champ!

Review.Titre: Part fo an old Wolf
Review.Contenu: found seals for my ancient Wolf stove....easy/peasy.Got new oven door seals sorted and calibrated the oven temperature....so maybe some chocolate chip cookies (not burned!!) will be coming my way from my bride....

Review.Titre: Working great
Review.Contenu: My furnace motor went out and on a Holiday weekend. If that's not bad enough it also runs my AC unit. Ordered a new motor from Direct Brand and it was here overnight, after the weekend and Holiday was over. I had it up and running in about 45 minutes.

Review.Titre: My order came much faster than I had…
Review.Contenu: My order came much faster than I had expected and was packed with care. If something else breaks I will definitely order through here again.

Review.Titre: I have had lots of problems with…
Review.Contenu: I have had lots of problems with ignitors on my timber wolf pellet stove.  This one has worked great for 2 months now. Compared to other cheap ignitors, 2 months is a good record!

Review.Contenu: Needed replacement pilot assemblies for my Southbend Oven.   Price, shipping speed and quality of parts were great.   Would definitely recommend!

Review.Titre: We have an Osburn pellett stove and…
Review.Contenu: We have an Osburn pellett stove and this igniter was different then original but we made it work. It is working perfectly no complaints!

Review.Titre: 40 year old 20” Brown stove oven control worked like A charm
Review.Contenu: Had a 40 year old Brown 20” stove on a property. The oven control finally went out. Looked up the part number here and they had the exact same part. Just took the old one out and plugged up the new one and off we went. They were several dollars less than competitors too. Over a week to arrive but the part was worth it.

Review.Titre: The part I needed was discontinued so I…
Review.Contenu: The part I needed was discontinued so I was skeptical about getting a replacement. Direct Brand had it for a reasonable price and it was shipped out very quickly. And the part worked. My oven lit right up. Direct Brand has been a five star service up to this point. Thanks.

Review.Titre: I have a great experience I two…
Review.Contenu: I have a great experience I two transactions first one delivery was super fast the only bad thing was the piece was a little dented but nothing crazy second time   everything was perfect

Review.Contenu: I needed the blower motor quickly, and I paid for the overnight service to make this happen. It arrived the next day, as promised. I installed it with no problems and it's been running like a champ since.

Review.Contenu: Received product quickly.  Ceramic igniter fired up nicely.  Wish they had more replacement parts for my Yoder smoker but I rehabbed it with this part

Review.Contenu: I ordered a thermostat for my apartment sized range and it fit and worked properly. I do wish I had gotten a new knob with it because I broke the old one taking it off, it was rusty.  All in all though I would use this site again and I will order a knob. Thanks.
